description: The main application component for a Tic Tac Toe game implemented using React. It handles game logic, state management, and renders the UI components.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: The main function component that manages the game state, renders the user interface, and handles user interactions.

methods.name: handleSquareClick
methods.description: Updates the game state when a square is clicked, checks for a winner, and updates the score.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: toggleGameMode
methods.description: Switches between two-player and computer game modes and resets the game.
